Text:
HolyRoses, I must say I have been a long time fan of your work! My Mom and I love your stuff! I also know that you are very busy, and if you ever need/want help/anything don't hesitate to ask.

I was wondering if you might know how to or have tried to encode your PiZ format or PSP with subtitles (but, not hardcoded subs)? 

The reason , why I'm asking is because my mom is really starting to be hard-of-hearing. So when we watch tv we use cc or movies we use subtitles.

If you know or don't know, please either leave a comment hear or email me! 
Email: angelicdemon69@hush.ai

Long Live HolyRoses!!!
If you are on Mac and want "softsubs" on the Apple TV i can recommend a app called "iSubtitle". Fast and easy.

A wish to you HR, is if you could find the old classic Star Wars Triology and do your magic on them. They are hard to find :P

I have them on DVD but would be nice to have them for the ATV.
yeah step brothers is one of my favs
Thanks HR. Gonna DL this now and have a check. ill get back with my resaults.

@HR Have started to play native now. Gonna flash it and use a external HDD instead. Streaming works only under perfect conditions now with the OS 3. Worked much smoother before but been planning to flash it for a while now and extend the features by the ATV Flash stick.
